The iPhone 14 Plus offers an amazing battery life and a big display experience for under 65k, which by Apple standards is an excellent proposition. If you are looking to try out the iOS experience and get good performance, this one is a much better option. You do miss out on a newer chip, a high refresh rate display, and better cameras, but you do get your money's worth in experience and software support.

Battery life and cameras are excellent. Happy with the large screen, however I wish it could have come with a high refresh rate. Overall a good experience with this iPhone...since I just wanted a big screen and didn't want to spend so much more on the pro max model.
